short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage Odoo Chatter and other practical utilities

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🔍 Short Description
Enhance your Odoo experience with customizable chatter positioning, persistent debug mode, and improved support page navigation.

✨ Key Features:

🔘 Toggle chatter visibility with a button or shortcut
📐 Choose between side-by-side or vertical chatter layout
⚙️ Set default chatter visibility preferences
🛠️ Debug Mode Management
⚡ Quick Access to Odoo's Settings app
🎨 Support Page Enhancements (Odoo Employees Only)
🕓 See your most recent opened pages 

---

🔐 Privacy & Permissions:

✅ Only activates on Odoo domains
🚫 No data collection
🌐 No external communications
🛡️ Minimal permissions required

This extension is open-source. Feedback and contributions are welcome!
